General.Name: Salon City Inc
General.Description: Salon City, Inc. publishes and distributes Salon Citymagazine in the United States and internationally. Salon Citymagazine is a trade/consumer magazine for salons, spas, and their clients. The company sells its magazine through national retailers, bookstores, newsstands, and grocery and drug chains. Salon City, Inc. was founded in 1995 and is based in West Hollywood, California.
General.Address: 909 North Palm Avenue, West Hollywood, CA, United States, 90069
